description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, garage extension and relocation of vehicular crossover
decision_conditions: The proposed parking provision and the proposed crossover extension by reason of location, increased vehicle maneuvering, inadequate opening, size and intervisibility splays; would prejudice the free flow of vehicular traffic and pedestrian activity within Idmiston Square which would compromise the existing highway safety conditions. The proposal would be contrary to Policy DM09 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames LDF Core Strategy (Adopted April 2012).

In accordance with the requirements of Local Government Act 1972 The Plans / Drawings / Documents submitted with the application were available on the Council's website during the assessment of the application.https://www.kingston.gov.uk/info/200155/planning_applications_and_permissions/263/find_a_planning_application_or_appeal
Please provide copies of previously approved proposed plans relating to the proposed changes which form part of this application
